Name: Nearest Utility
Description__c: Advance token to the nearest Utility.

Name: Property Repairs (1)
Description__c: Make general repairs on all your property: For each house pay $25, For each hotel $100.

Name: Reading Railroad
Description__c: Take a trip to Reading Railroad.

Name: Boardwalk
Description__c: Take a walk on the Boardwalk.

Name: Chairman of the Board
Description__c: You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player $50.

Name: Bank Error
Description__c: Bank error in your favor. Collect $200.

Name: Stock Sale
Description__c: From sale of stock you get $50.

Name: Opera Night
Description__c: Grand Opera Night. Collect $50 from every player for opening night seats.

Name: Birthday
Description__c: It is your birthday. Collect $10 from every player.

Name: Property Repairs (2)
Description__c: You are assessed for street repairs: Pay $40 per house and $115 per hotel you own.

Name: Beauty Context
Description__c: You have won second prize in a beauty contest. Collect $10.
